name: Dragonfly Earrings
description:
Dragonfly earrings are made from recycled cans and wire by craftspeople in Kisumu, Kenya.

Afrika Pamoja is a Kenyan social entrepreneurial project where young women who learned to make handicrafts can earn a living. These young women joined the Teenage Mothers and Girls Association of Kenya to learn vocational skills including craft-making.

name: Silk Knotted Necklace
description:
Show how chic fair trade can be by wearing these Bright Silk Knotted Necklaces. Artisans wrap individual beads in Cambodian silk and knot them together to create this unique and stylish piece of jewelry. So versatile you can wear them long or double wrapped! Each necklace comes in a matching organza pouch, perfect for gift giving.

Also available in Red, Indigo,  Deep Blue, Purple,  & Light Purple 

Plastic beads with Silk overlay

25”L

name: Copper Swirl Earrings
description: earrings of silver-plated brass accented with copper spiral designs.  The lightweight designs is 1" long.   Handcrafted by Indian fair trade artisans using their traditional metal-work techniques.

name: Nepali Necklace
description:
This casual necklace is the perfect accessory to wear with your everyday wardrobe favorites. Smoky marbled stone beads with wood accent beads on 30" long cotton cord. Made at Princess Home, Nepal

Stone and wood beaded necklace
30" on black cotton cord
Fair trade and environmentally friendly
Made in Nepal

name: Wave Design Bomb Casing Earrings
description:
Handcrafted in Cambodia, these earrings are made from found bomb casings left from previous conflicts. With a traditional Cambodian wave design, these earrings are 1.2 inches in diameter and have a high-polish finish.

Living in an underprivileged community approximately 30 minutes from Phnom Penh, Cambodia, artisans make jewelry from recycled bomb shells and bullets. These artisans use bomb casings left over from Cambodia's wartime three decades ago. These artisans skillfully mold bomb shells into beautiful jewelry pieces. With the support of Craftworks Cambodia, the artisans generate an income that will provide their families and their communities the chance at a better future. Through Craftworks Cambodia, the artisans make a fair wage for their work and receive support for education and training in the communities in Cambodia.

name: 3 Jade Strands/Silver Swirl Necklace
description:
Silversmiths in Surin, northeastern Thailand use simple tools to create distinctive beads from pure silver. The decorative patterns are hand-etched onto the surface of each bead. This painstaking intricate process, from the centuries-old Khmer Angkor kingdom , survives in only one small community. The focal point of this necklace is a 0.5 inch silver etched spiral bead with three different length strands of jade and silver that dangle from the center. The necklace also contains delicately etched silver flower beads. The claw clasp is accented with silver cylindrical beads with traditional Surin etchings. The necklace is approximately 16 inches long, with the longest dangling strand measuring 6.5 inches from the spiral bead.

GCFT

name: Wire Wrapped Shell Earrings
description: Random wire wrapping shrouds a mother of pearl shell. A great seller! Measures 0.75 in diameter. With brass hinged earring wires. Handmade by low-income women artisans near New Delhi, India, who are part of a women’s cooperative.

name: Crocheted Bracelet
description:
Crocheted jersey with colorblock wrapping detail makes a bold statement. Available in black, red and blue. 100% cotton knit. Size 9" around. 
Made by WARE

name: Freshwater Pearl Earrings
description:
Blue-Gray freshwater pearl earrings with smoky faceted crystal accent bead are a timeless classic! They match perfectly with our floating pearl necklace. Made by survivors in Thailand.

Freshwater pearl earrings on sterling silver ear wires
Made in Thailand
Ethical and sustainable

name: Sunlight Earrings
description:
These freshwater pearl earrings with etched sterling silver bead are bright and cheerful, a ray of sunshine on a dark day.

Freshwater pearl and silver bead earrings
Made in Thailand
Fair trade earrings

Our earrings are made by women around the world rebuilding their lives after surviving slavery or other human rights abuses.  Your purchase directly helps them to support themselves, rejoin society, and raise their children in freedom and safety.  Womens empowerment and sutainable fair trade with fashion and style!


When you buy a pair of our sterling silver, brass, pearl, or beaded earrings, you contribute to employment and education programs for women and children, such as Anisha, freed at age 18 with her infant son Ramesh and now living in safety and wellness.  Anisha used to be afraid to dream, but now dreams of a career as a master jeweler, and also wants to share her expertise by becoming a trainer for other poor and vulnerable women.

name: Bicycle Pin
description:
Made of recycled copper and steel wire in Kisumu, Kenya, the bicycle jewelry represents the most common mode of transportation in Western Kenya. The bicycle is approximately 2 inches long with a safety pin closure. Called "boda boda" by the locals, bicycles are used as public transportation (you ride on a padded rack on the back) and are named for the bikes used to transport people across the border between Uganda and Kenya -- from border to border. 
Wholesale Handmade Recycled Jewelry

name: Red Stone Bead Necklace
description:
Sporty, casual, and just perfect to wear with your everyday favorites. This funky necklace featuring 2 large red stone beads and delicate wooden accent beads on cotton cord, dresses up your beloved T-shirt and jeans. Adjustable to 30" in length.

Stone and wood beaded necklace
30" long on black cotton cord
Fair trade and environmentally friendly
Made in Nepal

name: Bliss Necklace
description:
This beautiful necklace has bright, uplifting red and amber colored stone beads, accented with wooden beads and marbled and striped glass beads in shades of gray and black, strung on 40" on two strands of knotted cotton cord. Made by the Princess Home artisans in Nepal.

Wood and stone beaded necklace
40" on two strands of cotton cord
Made in Nepal
Eco-conscious and fair trade

name: Squiggle Silver Plated Earrings
description: Made by Zakale Handicrafts in partnership with Jedendo Handicrafts in Nairobi, these silver plated earrings are all 100% handmade from brass wire and electroplating.

name: Perseverance Necklace
description:
Embrace the power of perseverance! Beautiful aqua-colored stones and earth tone wooden beads in a riot of shapes and sizes, on two strands of brown cotton cord. 35 inches long. Made by Survivors in Nepal

Wood and stone beaded necklace
35" on two strands of cotton cord
Made in Nepal
Ethical and environmentally conscious

name: Danica Pendant Necklace
description: A cluster of colorful, faceted beads clings to a smooth brass frame, and falls from a delicately beaded chain. Measures 17 inches plus extender. Handmade by low-income women artisans in New Delhi, India, who are part of a fair trade organization.

name: Red Jasper Oval Ring
description:
Handmade in South Africa from brass and red jasper. 

Adjustable size.

name: Silver Ring with Turquoise or Jasper Stones
description:
Handcast from fine alpaca silver with three  accent stones, this 1 inch tall ring wraps around the finger. 
Adjustable by squeezing or expanding the metal.

Made by the artisans of Tecalpulco, Mexico who have long been known for their silver and abalone jewelry. ArtCamp, short for Artesanas Campesinas (or rural female artisans), is a women-owned cooperative that continues this tradition.

name: Silver Leaf Pendant
description:
Heart-shaped, sterling silver leaves layer to form a gorgeous pendant. Leaves have a light hammered texture. 

2 in. x 1 1/2 in. with  18 in. chain

name: Olive Wood Tree of Life Pendant
description:
Olive wood from the Holy Land is laser cut with the Tree of Life to create this beautifully grained pendant. Comes on black cotton cord.

Pendant is 1.5 " x .75 " on a 21 inch black cord.

name: Tin Can Butterfly Earrings
description: Cut from pieces of tin cans, the two sets of wings and body riveted together, these earrings are in the shape of a butterfly  accented with wire antennae. The wingspan is about 3 inches. Tin can patterns and colors will vary.

name: Butterfly Tin Can Pin
description: Cut from pieces of tin cans, the two sets of wings and body riveted together, this pin in the shape of a butterfly is accented with wire antennae. The wingspan is about 3 inches. Safety pin closure. Tin can patterns and colors will vary.

name: Zipper Flower Ring
description:
A zippered take on a flower statement ring. Handmade in India. Measures 2 inches wide; adjusts to fit most ring sizes.

Available in Black or Sage.

name: Colorful Fabric Bracelet
description:
This Colorful Fabric Bracelet Set is handcrafted in Pakistan. Wear all four cloth-covered bangles together for a bolder look or sport them individually to add a bit of brilliance to any outfit. 

Metal with recycled fabric overlay
M: 2 1/2"D
L: 2 7/8"D
Both 3/8"W

Patterns and colors vary slightly

name: Satin Sunrise Coin Purse
description:
Vibrant sunrise pattern coin purse. Tiny pink seed beads and orange satin backing add a touch of luxury. Satin interior lining, zipper closure. 

5 1/4in. l x 3 1/2in. W

name: Coin Purse from Peru
description: These Coin Pouches from Peruvian Textiles are handcrafted in Cuzco, Peru in a leather workshop that provides training and employment to adolescent mothers. Each of these coin pouches is hand-stitched from traditional Peruvian cloth and locally-sourced leather.

name: Recycled Newspaper Wallet
description:
This Recycled Newspaper Wallet is light, compact and eco-friendly! Handcrafted from recycled Cambodian newspaper, this versitile wallet features four card slots, a large bill pocket and a zippered pocket. This Recycled Newspaper Wallet is a great gift for both men and women. 

 
Recycled Newspaper
4¼L x 3 1/3"W
4 card slots

name: Rice Bag Wallet
description: This Recycled Rice Bag Wallet is hand stitched by artisans in Cambodia. Its ample storage room includes card slots, change pocket, and a see-through window for a photo ID, while its snap closure is sure to keep everything safe. This eco-friendly Recycled Rice Bag Wallet is the perfect place to store your green!

name: Cotton Drawstring Backpack
description:
Small striped backpack in thick, heavy duty cotton. Drawstring main compartment with cotton lining, button closure on front flap and front zippered pocket. 

Dimensions: 15"H x 12"W x 5"D, Shoulder Straps: 1.5"W

name: Hobo bag
description:
Cleverly designed bag that can hold a lot. Made from medium weight printed cotton panels sewn in a patchwork pattern with decorative appliqué accents. This bag has an earthy rustic vibe about it. When closed there is a soft elongated billowy shape beginning with soft gathering at the top. Stonewashed Black cording trims the top and the same black fabric forms the 1" double fabric handles. Bag closes with a 15" zipper which cant be seen until the bag is opened flat when it resembles a duffle bag. Features a round wooden button with a loop closure at the center top. The inside has a thin black cotton lining and no interior pockets. When closed the bag measures 16" wide x 16" long. Handles measure 17" from their center to the top of bag. Overall length from top of handles to bottom of bag is 33". 
Fits comfortably over the shoulder and under your arm. 
Made in Nepal.

name: San Juan 3-zip Bag
description:
The San Juan 3-zip bag is made of fabric backstrap woven by Fair Trade Weaver’s in the San Juan region of the Guatemalan highlands. This deceptively small purse has three zipper pockets and can hold everything you need for a day of sight seeing or an afternoon of shopping. Long cord strap, lined, 3 zipper pockets. The San Juan Weaver’s Group is made up of Tz’utujil women who weave using backstrap Ikat, an ancient labor intensive technique of hand tying and dying threads in elaborate patterns. Their style of weaving uses textured cotton thread which softens with each washing. 
Size: 6 1/4 x 7 1/2 in, strap 52 inches.

name: Green Peace Bag
description: A fun, funky stonewash green sling bag with large embroidered peace sign. The outside fabric is a lightweight cotton, and the interior is a thin black cotton.

name: Cotton OM Bag
description: A stonewash black, embroidered OM sign sling bag that is large and roomy, lightweight and durable. Made with soft, natural cotton fabric. Has a zipper closure top with wooden button.

name: Chindi Bottle Bag
description:
Carry your water bottle with you wherever you go. Fits up to a liter-size bottle. Bag can be worn across the body. Chindi scrap fabric makes each one a surprise. 

Made by Sahara

name: Green Floral Zip Shoulder Bag
description:
Vibrant floral patterns in blue, maroon, green and purple. 

Dimensions: 13" H x 18" W. Shoulder Straps: 16" L x 1" W.

name: Anju Chindi Bag
description:
Same great Mala bag, but offered in a new size to let you carry a book or electronic devices. Recycled chindi strips make each one unique. 
9" x 6.5" with a long strap and zipper closure.

name: Chindi Mala Bag
description:
A bag with character, that is great for carrying small essentials. 5" x 5.5" with a long strap and zipper closure. 
Made by Nirmaan

name: White Embroidered Bag
description: A subtle, simple, elegant hobo style handbag made of a soft, natural cotton fabric with a large embroidered pattern on the front. We have this bag is both black and white/natural fabric. There is not a zipper closure on the main compartment, it does have a magnetic button closure and the inside has a nice cotton lining. This bag looks great with blue jeans, and goes with almost anything.

name: Hibiscus Graphic Sling Bag
description:
Hand appliqué in tonal geometric prints makes this simple messenger style so special. 100% cotton. 
13" x 10".  
 
Made by Aashiyana

name: Sling Hippie Bag
description: A very simple but very cool sling bag. Not a huge bag, but a classic shape with a simple message, "LOVE". The letters are hand stitched on the front of the bag and the bag itself is an aqua blupe stone wash color. There is a zipper closure to the main compartment with a wooden button loop as well. The fabric is sturdy, but slighly lightweight and very soft and comfortable. The inside of the shoulder bag strap is a stonewash black fabric. There is a small zipper pocket on the back side of the bag.

name: Organic Cotton Scarf
description:
Handmade Traditional Block Print Design 

Blue and White

name: Pastel Tie-Dye Silk Scarf
description:
Add some flare to your outerwear with these lovely Pastel Tie-Dye Silk Scarves. Available in three soft hues, these hand-dyed silk scarves are light enough to be worn in multiple seasons, making them both fashionable and versatile!

Silk
65”L x 18”W
Available in Violet, Periwinkle and Lilac

name: Amba Silk and Wool Scarf
description:
Our Amba Silk & Wool Scarf is hand-woven using soft silk & wool in a colorful plaid design. A playful color combination of stripes on a white background, this fairtrade scarf will jazz up any outfit!

Size: 21" x 70"

Color: Multicolor

name: Batik Scarf
description:
Catch a breeze and add a splash of color to your wardrobe with our collection of tropical scarves. 100% Cotton voile. 
Hand printed batik with tassels at the corners. 

18" x 72"

Purple or Blue

name: 3D Sponge Painted Sun Metal Drum Art
description: With a convex shape and protruding nose, this 10 inch diameter sun face crafted from recycled oil drums in Croix des Bouquets, Haiti is a unique piece of wall art. Suitable for hanging indoors or outdoors, the piece is sponge painted in 2 colors and has a hook on back for hanging.

name: Dove Steel Ornament
description:
Handmade Dove from Haiti --made from scrap steel drums. They are light enough to hang well on a tree and keep Haiti in mind during the holiday period or throughout the year.  
The dove is 2.5 inches tall and 3 inches wide.

name: Painted Gecko Metal Magnet
description: This metal gecko magnet is handmade in Haiti from recycled steel oil drums. They measure 4 by 2.5 inches in size, each is hand painted.

name: Frog Metal Magnet
description:
This metal frog magnet is handmade in Haiti from recycled steel oil drums. They measure 4 by 2.5 inches in size, each is hand painted.

Please let us know if you have a color preference.  Designs are varied.

name: Zulu Open Nut Bowl
description: Made of ilala palm by Ilala Weavers of South Africa, these baskets in natural colors are a great accent to any decor. The baskets average 5-6 in diameter and are approximately 2-3" deep. However sizes do vary and deeper baskets may be slightly smaller in diameter while flatter baskets are larger in diameter.

name: Attitude Angel Tin Ornament
description:
This 3 inch angel ornament, made from recycled drink cans, are made by Zulu school children as an extra-mural activity. These students live in an area of Northern Zululand where the AIDS epidemic is very high, and are themselves orphans who have been left destitute. The project is part of the Angels Against Crime project. The head of the angel is a large wood or transparent plastic bead. Beaded loop for attaching a hook. These angels are available in many can designs. 
Please specific a color preference-red, green, yellow, orange.

name: Pink Painted Dragonfly Drum Art
description: This painted dragonfly with pink wings is handmade in Haiti from steel oil drums. It has an 11 inch wingspan and is 9 inches tall. Metal hook for hanging. Suitable for hanging indoors or outdoors.

name: Yellow Painted Frog Drum Art Wall Hanging
description:
This yellow metal frog is handmade in Haiti from recycled steel oil drums. In the tradition of colorful tree frogs, it is painted brilliant colors. 

Approximately 10 X 10 inches.

name: Green Painted Dragonfly Drum Art
description: This painted dragonfly with green wings is handmade in Haiti from steel oil drums. It has an 11 inch wingspan and is 9 inches tall. Metal hook for hanging. Suitable for hanging indoors or outdoors.

name: Peace/Love Bag
description: A fun, colorful sling bag that is great for spring and summer. Goes great with jeans and t-shirt. Lightweight cotton fabric, with large, roomy interior.

name: Oval Lamp Shade
description:
A great way to change decor without spending a fortune. This modern oval shaped lampshade has a collapsible rattan frame and is covered with cotton in an original print. 

Use a 60 watt or less bulb or a battery operated light.

name: Zulu "Beer Basket"
description:
This "Ukhamba" or beer basket is a bulb-shaped basket with a lid traditionally used to store the local brew. Made in South Africa by Ilala Weavers.  
Designs will vary. 

Small baskets are approximately 6" tall. 

Medium Baskets are approximately 8" tall.

name: Zulu Herb Basket
description:
This "Ukhamba" or beer basket is a bulb-shaped basket with a lid traditionally used to store the local brew. Made in South Africa by Ilala Weavers, these herb baskets are miniature versions and are used to store dry herbs.

Small basket is approximately 3" tall.  

Medium basket is approximately 4" tall.

name: Recycled Sari Table Runner
description:
Bearing all of the brilliant color and personality of the saris from which they were made, this table runner adds a casual and colorful addition to any table. Colors and patterns will vary. Hand wash cold. 

55in. L x 13in. W

name: Peace Votive Candle Holder
description:
Whitewashed terracotta votive holder shines with a big message for 'peace,' inscribed in various languages. 

 4 1/2 in. diameter

name: Owl Branch Mobile
description:
Adorable Mobile with two owls on a perch. Hand carved. Details will vary. 

Approximately 7" x 7".

name: Owl Gourd Box
description:
This cool design is a hit. This would be a great place to keep keys and other little things, besides, blondes have more fun! An original and delightful gift for just about anyone! This all natural design combines a natural gourd with fine hand carving and burning. Sizes and details shown will vary as nature and the artist intended. The inside of this gourd box has been finished with a protective coating.
Size is approximately 4"- 5".

name: Penguin Carved Gourd Box
description:
An original and delightful gift for just about anyone! Contemporary Peruvian master gourd carvers follow a tradition of over 4000 years as they finely carve intricate designs with simple hand chisels and then naturally color their designs with fire. Sizes and details shown will vary as nature and the artist intended. The inside of this gourd box has been finished with a protective coating. 
Average size is 4"-5" inches.

name: Tropical Jungle Gourd Ornament
description:
Carved with an assortment of birds, jaguars, snakes, monkeys and other animals and colored with a technique used by Peruvian artists for over 4000 years.  These vary in details and are each approximately 3" tall.  
Available in Green, Red, and Yellow. 
Please specify color.

name: Snowman Gourd Ornament
description:
Contemporary Peruvian master gourd carvers follow a tradition over 4,000 years old as they finely carve with simple hand chisels the intricate designs and then naturally color them with fire.  
Sizes and snowman designs will vary as nature and the artist intended.
Available in red or natural.

name: Nativity Gourd Ornament
description: Hand carved nativity with the Holy Family, shepherds and animals under a sky of stars.  Naturally colored by firing techniques used by Peruvian artists for over 400 years.  Average ornament is 3" tall.  Details vary since they are each handcrafted.

name: Owl Gourd Ornament
description: Each owl gourd ornament is hand carved and naturally colored with fire using Peruvian techniques used by artists for over 4000 years.  These owls average 2" tall and details will vary.

name: Red Santa- Gourd Ornament
description: Peruvian master gourd carvers following a tradition over 4000 years old produce these finely carved ornaments.  Santa gourd averages abotu 3" and details will vary since they are individually handcrafted.

name: Red Owl Gourd Ornament
description: An adorable red owl expertly carved into a natural gourd by Peruvian artists.  The  owls average 3" tall--since they are handcrafted, details will vary.

name: Wild Goose Festival Display
description: See something you liked at Wild Goose?  Let me know, and I'll ship it out to you.
